name: Sunset Hollow
description:
A short platformer/in-progress Metroidvania game made for the Metroidvania Month 17 game jam!

I am a beginner game developer, and this is my first released project!

KEEP IN MIND! This game is a prototype, so you might encounter BUGS! Here are a few that I am aware of and am trying to fix:

- Playing the game, opening the pause menu, and clicking on "Main Menu" will result in the menu being loaded, but stuck on the options screen, giving you no choise but to force quit the game (ALT+F4)

- None others?

THE OPTIONS MENU IN THE PAUSE MENU DOES NOT EXIST NO MATTER HOW MUCH YOU SPAM THE OPTIONS BUTTON!!!

CONTROLS:

Left/Right arrow keys - move left and right

Up arrow - jump

Z - interact/continue

The more momentum you have, the higher you jump, so try getting a running start!

Thanks for reading!

- Mang0o
